EmailTemplate.subject: Save the date â€” Ecommerce Workshop on June 7th in Chicago, IL
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join us for the Best Practices in Ecommerce workshop hosted by BigCommerce. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Planning to be in the Chicago area on June 7th? Join us for the Best Practices in Ecommerce Workshop <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/BigCommerce-IRCE16-Ecommerce-Workshop.html]]> hosted by BigCommerce. This free event offers a unique opportunity for online merchants to connect and network with industry leaders to discover the latest ecommerce trends, all while learning best practices in store design, conversion, and omnichannel. What: Best Practices in Ecommerce Workshop, lunch will be provided When: Tuesday, June 7th from 11:00 AM - 4:00 PM Where: Hyatt Regency 151 E Upper Wacker Dr, Chicago, IL 60601
Register to attend <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/BigCommerce-IRCE16-Ecommerce-Workshop.html]]> Hope to see you there, The BigCommerce Team
